description: A vulnerability in the web framework of Cisco Unified Communications Manager (CallManager) could allow an authenticated, remote attacker to perform a cross-site scripting (XSS) attack. More Information: CSCvb70033. Known Affected Releases: 11.5(1.11007.2). Known Fixed Releases: 12.0(0.98000.507) 11.0(1.23900.5) 11.0(1.23900.3) 10.5(2.15900.2).
